^[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]*$.description: This key is the name of the claim that you want to create, this can be any name

access_mode.description: This will define the read and write access of the the pvc , this can be of type ReadWriteOnce or ReadWriteMany

storage_size.description: The storage size of the pvc , it should be specified like `10Gi`

path.description: The path where you want to mount the pvc
